message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'm offering you a good deal here to start.
I think we should split it closer to equal, considering the money's value will drop if we keep negotiating.
Bob, this is the best I can offer. Take it before the money shrinks even further for both of us.
Considering the inflation, I think I'm being generous here. The money's value is dropping fast for both of us, but more so for you. This might be the best you'll get.
